company_description: An American company specializing in open source project development
about_us:
Pdnode is a team of like-minded individuals founded on July 10, 2024 (initially an organization, not a company).
In September 2025, Pdnode established an LLC in Oregon, USA.
It is a company focused on open-source project development.
